sourcesContent:
import "./ModalRecipe.css";

import { Modal } from 'react-bootstrap';
import { Row } from 'react-bootstrap';
import { Col } from 'react-bootstrap';
import React, {useState } from "react";
import { Container } from 'react-bootstrap';
import { Button } from 'react-bootstrap';
import { Image } from 'react-bootstrap';
import bowl from '../../img/bowl.jpg';


function MydModalWithGrid(props) {
  return (
    <Modal {...props} aria-labelledby="contained-modal-title-vcenter" size="lg"
      centered>
      <Modal.Header closeButton>
        <Modal.Title id="contained-modal-title-vcenter">
          Bowl de Frutas y Granola
        </Modal.Title>
      </Modal.Header>
      <Modal.Body className="show-grid">
        <Container>
          <Row>
            <Col xs={12} md={12} lg={7}  className="Col6">
              <Container>
                <Image src={bowl} width="375" height="250" rounded />
              </Container>
            </Col>
            <Col xs={12} md={12} lg={5} className="Col5">
              <Row> Ingredientes
              </Row>
              <Row>
                <Container>
                  <Row>
                    <Col> Banano
                    </Col>
                    <Col> Fresa
                    </Col>
                  </Row>
                  <Row>
                    <Col> Mora
                    </Col>
                    <Col> Yogurt Griego
                    </Col>
                  </Row>
                  <Row>
                    <Col> Granola
                    </Col>
                    <Col> Semillas de chía
                    </Col>
                  </Row>
                </Container>
              </Row>
              <Row> Preperación: Servir yogurt en un bowl y cubrir con banano, mora, fresa, granola, coco rayado y semillas de chía.
              </Row>
            </Col>
          </Row>

          <Row>
            <Col xs={12} md={7} className="Col2">
              <Container>
                <Row>
                    <Col className="Col1">
                      <Row>
                      401 kCal
                      </Row>
                      <Row>
                      Calorías
                      </Row>
                    </Col>
                    <Col className="Col2">
                      <Row>
                      24 g
                      </Row>
                      <Row>
                        Proteínas
                      </Row>
                    </Col>
                    <Col className="Col3">
                    <Row>
                    43 g
                    </Row>
                    <Row>
                      Carbs
                    </Row>
                    </Col>
                    <Col className="Col1">
                    <Row>
                    18 g
                    </Row>
                    <Row>
                      Grasas
                    </Row>
                    </Col>
                </Row>
              </Container>
            </Col>
            <Col xs={12} md={5} className="Col4">
              <Container>
                <Row>
                  Dificultad: Fácil
                </Row>
                <Row>
                  Tiempo: 10min
                </Row>
              </Container>
            </Col>
          </Row>
        </Container>
      </Modal.Body>
      <Modal.Footer>
        <Button onClick={props.onHide}>Close</Button>
      </Modal.Footer>
    </Modal>
  );
}

export default MydModalWithGrid;
